name: mint-bot-enhanced
description: Enhanced NFT mint bot with advanced gas management, mempool monitoring, multi-RPC failover, and aggressive optimization strategies.

scripts.competitive: cross-env DYNAMIC_FEE_MULTIPLIER=2.0 AGGRESSIVE_GAS_BUMP=50 CONCURRENCY=12 node mint-bot-optimized.js
scripts.setup: cp env.optimized.example .env && echo 'Setup complete! Edit .env with your settings.'
